dict.acceptation: 妻子，太太；夫人，老婆；已婚妇女；

sent.orig: Divorce wife A, marry wife B, continue to live in the same neighborhood as wife A.
sent.trans: 后来离异，与B结婚，并与前妻A作为邻居一起生活。

sent.orig: I am a capable wife and mother, but I am not schedule myself wife mother!
sent.trans: 结婚，是因为喜欢一个人并且愿意一起分享喜乐，不是人生的任务，更没有时间表！

sent.orig: Mr. Wang's children by his first wife are not kind to his present wife.
sent.trans: 王先生的继子女对他现在的太太不太友善。

sent.orig: Better a portion in a wife than with a wife.
The woman thanked my wife profusely while her partner picked my wife's handbag.
sent.trans: 就在那个女人不断表示感谢的时候，她的同伙就偷了我太太手提包里头的东西。
